#id=1
#text=On Saturday I baked a chocolate cake for my dad 's birthday .
#id=2
#text=On Saturday morning , I went to the local supermarket and bought all the necessary ingredients .
#id=3
#text=When I arrived back home , I laid all the ingredients out on the kitchen counter .
#id=4
#text=I then preheated the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit and greased a cake tin with butter .
#id=5
#text=Then , following the directions in the recipe I found in my cookbook , I measured out the correct quantities for all the ingredients .
#id=6
#text=I then made the cake batter following the step-by-step instructions in the recipe .
#id=7
#text=When the batter was made , I poured it into my greased cake pan .
#id=8
#text=I then placed the cake in the oven and set the kitchen timer to 45 minutes .
#id=9
#text=When the timer rang , I removed the cake from the oven , using kitchen mitts so I would n't burn my hands .
#text=I then placed the pan on the counter for 5 minutes .
#text=After 5 minutes had passed , I carefully removed the cake from the pan and placed it on a wire rack to cool .
#text=When the cake was completely cool , I iced it with chocolate frosting .
